title: Luka Lights Up Mexico City. Plus: Is There a Trade Out There for the Celtics? | The Mismatch
description:
With Luka Doncic continuing to put up gaudy numbers (this time in Mexico), we imagine a world in which the NBA continues its global expansion and increases its player pool. Are there enough talented players for 34 teams, or even 36 (3:50)? Then, we run down some of the potential players who could get moved in the coming weeks, now that the Dec. 15 restriction on trades for free-agent signings has been removed (32:17).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
